title: Trump vows U.S. troops on border amid migrant 'caravan'
text:
Trump vows U.S. troops on border amid migrant 'caravan' 5:27am IST - 02:10 
As a so-called ''refugee caravan'' makes its way from Central America to the United States, President Donald Trump renewed his calls Monday for Congress to act on immigration, urging lawmakers in a tweet to ''use the nuclear option if necessary.''   
As a so-called "refugee caravan" makes its way from Central America to the United States, President Donald Trump renewed his calls Monday for Congress to act on immigration, urging lawmakers in a tweet to "use the nuclear option if necessary."  //reut.rs/2H5BEjr
